item.description:
Hi Everyone,

OK I decided to try something different... I thought we could meet at the Connecticut Post Mall in Milford at 12:00 p.m.

http://us.lrd.yahoo.c...

us.lrd.yahoo.com/_ylt=AlQkAMRYFmTIIidF.FFOiaeKNcIF/SIG=11ll8o3ck/**http%3A//www.westfield.com/us/centres/connecticut/

I chose this location because it is centrally located and hopefully not that far of a drive for anyone that wants to go. There are a couple of places that we can have coffee there and then watch a movie (that everyone can agree on) at the theater there. I will try to post a movie schedule sometime this week.

I would like to meet in front of Borders Book Store. I hope to see you there!!!

http://www.borderssto...

www.bordersstores.com/stores/store_pg.jsp?storeID=165

Westfield Conn. Post Mall, Milford another link to it

http://www.8towns.com...

www.8towns.com/milford_mall.php


Thank you.

Dawn.


2)
I would like to add in here that Dan Gordon, the author of the books
Haunted Baseball and Cape Encounters will be at this same Borders on
Sunday, December 9 from 1 to 3 pm signing his books.

http://www.hauntedbas...

www.hauntedbaseball.com/

In case anyone would want to buy a copy of his books and get them
Signed before heading into the movies.

http://www.borderssto...

www.bordersstores.com/events/events.jsp?view=1&storeID=165

I was informed of this event by http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/index/

Mike B.,
Coffee Talk
Assistant Organizer
item.name: Coffee and a Movie...
